title: Euro Truck Simulator 2 v1.4.1 crackfix
description:
I decided to upload this so it would be easier to find. Credits to a comment from  Machine4578 which led me to the crack.

This crack fixes the trailer bug commonly found in this version of the game. I tried it with version 1.4.1 and 1.4.8 and they work fine. I recommend installing a fresh copy, updating to the listed versions, then copying over the crack.
